name: Colin

responses.ignored Return: I'm sorry but I'm too busy now. You should have talked to me earlier!
responses.Falsely Accused: Well I never! How dare you!
responses.Big Footprint: I'm afraid my feet are smaller than that, young chap! Try %NPC instead.
responses.Small Footprint: That looks much more similar to , but it looks closer to %NPC's.
responses.Glasses: I don't wear glasses, I'm afraid. But %NPC does.
responses.Bag: My backpack is right here! I think %NPC lost theirs.
responses.Lipstick: No, I don't wear lipstick. I know %NPC does, though.
responses.Right Handed: I am right handed. But so is %NPC.
responses.Dark Hair: Don't think it could be my hair, I have grey hair. %NPC has hair like that.
responses.Erotic Novel: Why that's 50 Spades of Hay! %NPC and I wrote it!
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: It might be mine, but it looks more like %NPC's.
responses.Car Keys: HAH! I don't need to drive! I think %NPC has a car like that though.
responses.Knife: Not my knife, I'm afraid. I'm more of a green window person. %NPC uses knives for cooking.
responses.Cricket Bat: Not a cricket player I'm afraid! I think %NPC likes the odd spot of cooking.
responses.Energy Drink: I'm more inclined to tea, I'm afraid. %NPC tends to drink it in my lectures though.
responses.Red Scarf: I do wear scarfs, but so does %NPC.
responses.Hockey Stick: I think %NPC enjoys the odd spot of hockey.
responses.Hardware Magazine: Oh, one of my favourite magazines! I recommended it to %NPC, so this might be their copy.
responses.Diamond Ring: I think %NPC lost a ring recently.
responses.Receipt: Isn't %NPC vegan? I'm afraid I'm not sure.
responses.USB Stick: I wouldn't know anything about any *shudder* humanities. I think %NPC studies history.
responses.Sweet Wrapper: Ah, coffee, the drink of champions! That's a passion that myself and %NPC share.
